B2 [ C or U ] the fact of something such as a bomb exploding: The fire was thought to have been caused by a gas explosion.explosion of The explosion (= the intentional exploding) of nuclear devices in the Bikini Atoll was stopped in 1958.
More examplesFewer examplesFortunately there was no one in the house at the time of the explosion.The explosion sent pieces of metal and glass hurtling through the air.Eight people, including two children, were injured in the explosion.The explosion brought the whole building crashing to the ground.Witnesses say that there was an explosion and then the plane dropped from the sky.
